name: Opennote
long_description:
Opennote is building an AI tutor that lives in your notes, giving every student a truly personalized learning experience.

Most students struggle with scattered knowledge across different apps and tools that don't understand their learning style. Opennote changes that with an intelligent note-taking platform where your AI tutor knows your learning style, connects your existing knowledge bases and the web, and provides real-time feedback right where you're already working.
one_liner: The AI tutor that lives in your notes
